===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[pleased]]; [[happy]]
# [[forthright]]; [[plainspoken]]
# [[rapid]]; [[quick]]; [[speedy]]; [[fast]]
# [[sharp]] (of knives); [[clever]] (of wits)
# [[quickly]]; [[hurriedly]]
# to be [[about]] to; [[almost]]
#: {{zh-x|我 快 到 了。|I am '''about to''' arrive.}}
# to [[hurry]]; to [[hasten]]; to [[hurry up]]
#: {{zh-x|快 啲 啦！|'''Hurry up'''!|C}}
